/**
 * 作者：Mr.wang
 * 时间：2022/4/15
 * 文件名：count_action
 * 项目名称：脚手架
 * WebStorm
 */import{DECREMENT,INCREMENT}from"../constant";export var createIncrementAction=function createIncrementAction(data){return{type:INCREMENT,data:data};};export var createDecrementAction=function createDecrementAction(data){return{type:DECREMENT,data:data};};export var createDecrementSyncAction=function createDecrementSyncAction(data,time){return function(dispatch){setTimeout(function(){dispatch(createIncrementAction(data));},time);};};
